body: 2/ Dr. Piper, a Polish historian, estimated, based on the number of trains coming in and out of Auschwitz, that the number of *people* (because not all were Jews) that went into Auschwitz alone was somewhere around 1.1 million. Of those, only ~200,000 were registered. Given all the testimonies of people in and around Auschwitz, where could those missing 700,000 people be, if not dead?

body: Not really here to be pro- or anti-, "number of trains" isn't a great measurement.  Trains could bring people, food, troops, ammo, weapon, supplies.  Anything at all.
body_html: Not really here to be pro- or anti-, "number of trains" isn't a great measurement. Trains could bring people, food, troops, ammo, weapon, supplies. Anything at all.

parent.body: 2/ Dr. Piper, a Polish historian, estimated, based on the number of trains coming in and out of Auschwitz, that the number of *people* (because not all were Jews) that went into Auschwitz alone was somewhere around 1.1 million. Of those, only ~200,000 were registered. Given all the testimonies of people in and around Auschwitz, where could those missing 700,000 people be, if not dead?

parent.body: 2/ Dr. Piper, a Polish historian, estimated, based on the number of trains coming in and out of Auschwitz, that the number of *people* (because not all were Jews) that went into Auschwitz alone was somewhere around 1.1 million. Of those, only ~200,000 were registered. Given all the testimonies of people in and around Auschwitz, where could those missing 700,000 people be, if not dead?

body:
Thx for the reply.

> Why did the plaque at Auschwitz have to change from 4 Million killed to just 1 Million?

1 million is a great estimate on the particular set of concentration camps studied by Piper. It's the easiest point I can source to break the "it was only 200,000" argument"

> Why don't the tattoo numbers they had ever reach 1 million?

"About 81 percent of Jews transported to Auschwitz by the Holocaust trains, or 890,000 men, women, and children, met their deaths immediately upon arrival and were not registered." - Same author who studied the train timetables noted this. Tends to be loosely matched with recounts of the events.

Patton had the right idea....

body:
> Following the camp's liberation, the Soviet government issued a statement, on 8 May 1945, that four million people had been killed on the site, a figure based on the capacity of the crematoria.

These were not "clean the cremation, check for safety, register all the numbers" modern day facilities. These were massive ovens - designed for the single industrial purpose to exterminate Jews. They had the resources to build them, there's hundreds of matching recounts of the size, and the deportation records seal it from another angle.

If it was all a lie, how deep can it go?

body:
There's been plenty of other genocides. Why would one specifically happening to the Jews get such an insane degree of notoriety? The only solutions that make any sense are:

1. Jews and/or their lackeys have more power in government than any other group

2. The numbers were inflated or completely invented to make them so high

3. Other genocides are ignored

The funny thing is, in reality, all three are true.

body:
A joint [study](https://www1.udel.edu/educ/gottfredson/30years/Rushton-Jensen30years.pdf) from the University of Western Ontario and University of Berkeley on the past 30 years' research on race and IQ certainly did note that Jews are of higher IQ, but only questioned whether the "average IQ is purely social, economic, and cultural or whether genetic factors are also involved."

The line (`[...]` was my edit) :

> The study also found that the average IQ for African Americans was lower than those for Latino, White, Asian, and Jewish Americans (85, 89, 103, 106, and 113, respectively [...])

body:
> the Nazis were killing Jews

This was never proven with any authentic wartime document. David Irving offered $1,000 (British Pounds) to anyone that could provide a single authentic document showing Hitler ordered, or was even aware of the killing of Jews. He **did find** however, documents (cables sent) ordering **protection** to the Jews on the Night of Broken Glass. The other side of that is [what the Jews did to the Germans](https://archive.org/details/WhatTheJewsDidToTheGermans). 

![](https://files.catbox.moe/60rpss.jpg) ![](https://files.catbox.moe/v4rm2h.jpg) ![](https://i.ibb.co/n3mNWhn/1599686989537.png) (An actual Jew being gassed) ![](https://files.catbox.moe/d9cnzs.jpg)

the Nazis were killing Jews

This was never proven with any authentic wartime document. David Irving offered $1,000 (British Pounds) to anyone that could provide a single authentic document showing Hitler ordered, or was even aware of the killing of Jews. body:
Yes, I'm sure some dirty Israeli politicians pulled the Holocaust card to get ahead. Ironically, Israel was hardly targeted.

I want to address your last meme though because I think it's important - we have a whole bunch of different sources, on a *global* scale, during a time of education and economic growth. The number of people surveyed was drastically increasing. Can we get a more accurate measurment?

[Sort of?](https://www.pewresearch.org/fact-tank/2015/02/09/europes-jewish-population/) It's non-trivial to find purely European Jewish population without going into [existing](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/List_of_genocides_by_death_toll#cite_note-4) sources, but if you want to just look at reported numbers you go right back to [6 million](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/List_of_genocides_by_death_toll)

(and, by the way, these sources are much more detailed than the "National Council of Churches 1930 World Jewish Population" which I can't even find)

Russia wasn't Christian by then because the communists persecuted **all religion**, even Judaism. When you look at the massive numbers, it was Allies vs. Axis, both Christian. (Although Hitler did have some Muslim/Hindu serving in the SS). 

As far as **HOW** they supposedly died, there's much to consider outside of only looking at the Jews' plight. The ones that **did** die, either died fighting the Germans as Communist Bolshevik soldiers in Russia, or they died from **Typhus** that resulted from **Allied bombing of German railroad lines supplying them with food and medicine**. They also bombed a water purification plant on the river, forcing them to drink contaminated water, likely causing the massive Typhus outbreak. ![](https://files.catbox.moe/39gmyw.jpg) 

What did they use to combat Typhus? A bug/pest delousant called Zyklon-B ![](https://files.catbox.moe/v4rm2h.jpg) ![](https://files.catbox.moe/d9cnzs.jpg) It leaves a blue stain behind, which David Cole (A Jew) found little evidence of in the "gas chambers" of Auschwitz. He found one spot that looked like it was wiped on. The fumigation chambers for bedding and clothing, were deeply penetrated with the blue substance. 

Take a look at these videos (if you are truly open minded) asking these critical questions: [David Irving](https://www.bitchute.com/video/K8hflhuRBuE5/) and [David Cole inspects the camp](https://www.bitchute.com/video/vAFKVGuW0QL1/). 

In addition to the "HOW" they died topic, Jews themselves were not innocent. body:
@JosephGoebbels

1/ The Holocaust is the most documented genocide event in world history. It is on the same level as denying the moon landing and other conspiracy theories: in the face of overwhelming evidence, there are still people who manage to deny everything and cling onto questions that have already been answered a million times. 

The International Military Tribunal made a film, "The Nazi Concentration Camps", showing footage that the Allies took when they first entered the concentration camps, about 1 hr long: https://www.c-span.org/video/?400657-1/nazi-concentration-prison-camps. 

The shear amount of footage, the enormous number of Holocaust survivors who has provided first hand eyewitness accounts, and the existing evidence that exists in the form of Auschwitz and other concentration camps, is so vast and massive that it takes nothing other than complete willful ignorance to deny. 

One good website I've found is https://www.ushmm.org/antisemitism/holocaust-denial-and-distortion/evidence-documentation-holocaust. 

Another good article: https://www.bbc.co.uk/history/worldwars/genocide/deniers_01.shtml 

All the questions here have already been answered, but in the spirit of free discussion and Ruqqus, I indulge you. 

Answering the cremation question: https://phdn.org/archives/holocaust-history.org/auschwitz/body-disposal/. Read on, and find that 30,000 cremation per month is a conservative estimate of the capacity of Auschwitz crematories. Googling it, it takes 1 to 3 hours to cremate a body. So JosephGoebbels, your cartoon ia utter rubbish. As for burying them, that's the easy part. Stalin, Mao, and Pol Pot had no problem, and neither would the Nazis.

EDIT: formatting.

body: Or you just don't feed people good food so they can't fight, transport them frequently around so they never see the same people too much. Of course some inmates knew that something was happening, but in that situation you can't predict that you will be showed into a train and travel 14 days without food or water with 100 others. At the start many inmates were first shipped into one place, then with another group other place, and then killed at the third place; "yes I'll just wait for my turn." works if you assume that there is another, better location and that's what soldiers were told, that's what soldiers told the rest. Yea, it's normal to have a prison camp for enemies, but not to dispose of them in such numbers. But I still think that Holocaust shouldn't be held on a greater standard than Cambodian or Armenian genocide. If I were to sum it up; I think it happened/is possible that happened but don't attribute such a high amount of deaths to Nazis themselves. Also for the original comment you should know that many Jews died at the hands of the occupying armies in the initial takings of the cities - Odessa as an example.

body:
> 1/ The Holocaust is the most documented genocide event in world history. It is on the same level as denying the moon landing and other conspiracy theories: in the face of overwhelming evidence, there are still people who manage to deny everything and cling onto questions that have already been answered a million times.

Except in **both** cases they admit they faked it to a certain degree. Theres movie footage of the moon landing where the flag is blowing in the wind. They didn't know yet that the moon as no air, hence there wouldn't be wind. Only **then** did they admit they faked it "to stifle the Russian's attempt to beat us to the moon". My grandpa was alive and well back in 1964, and even he doubted the validity of it. Same applies for the alleged holocaust. ![](https://files.catbox.moe/kscc94.png) 

In addition, the very term "conspiracy theorist" was weaponized by the CIA in 1967 to denounce anyone [questioning the narrative of an official report](https://www.topsecretwriters.com/2018/02/cia-invented-term-conspiracy-theory-discredit/). 

> The International Military Tribunal made a film, "The Nazi Concentration Camps", showing footage that the Allies took when they first entered the concentration camps, about 1 hr long: https://www.c-span.org/video/?400657-1/nazi-concentration-prison-camps.

If this were a court case, under cross examination, can it be proven that the movie footage was actually taken **as they entered the camp** and not **after they seized control of the camps**? Also, if it was a death camp, why did they have amenities and creature comforts? ![](https://files.catbox.moe/8aq4dc.png) In addition, the Nuremberg Trials declared the **Jews didn't need proof of their claims** but the Nazis on trail did. ![](https://files.catbox.moe/xaizac.png)

> The shear amount of footage, the enormous number of Holocaust survivors who has provided first hand eyewitness accounts, and the existing evidence that exists in the form of Auschwitz and other concentration camps, is so vast and massive that it takes nothing other than complete willful ignorance to deny.

Problem: Jews themselves admitted to lying and the photos were exposed as fakes. ![](https://files.catbox.moe/giv45g.jpg) ![](https://files.catbox.moe/zv33hd.jpg) Many of the stories, when put into practicality, are flat out ridiculous. ![](https://files.catbox.moe/gs9odv.jpg) ![](https://files.catbox.moe/sun7fd.png) ![](https://files.catbox.moe/hwsc8y.jpg)

> One good website I've found is https://www.ushmm.org/antisemitism/holocaust-denial-and-distortion/evidence-documentation-holocaust. 

Before I look at that, I first have to ask about the organization itself. Who owns it, who controls it, what's their background? And will I find any common denominators? 

> Another good article: https://www.bbc.co.uk/history/worldwars/genocide/deniers_01.shtml

BBC happens to be owned and controlled by Jews, of course they'll dismiss any questioning of their official story. You will find this with most mainstream news sources. ![](https://files.catbox.moe/r4j72e.JPG)

> All the questions here have already been answered, but in the spirit of free discussion and Ruqqus, I indulge you.

> Answering the cremation question: https://phdn.org/archives/holocaust-history.org/auschwitz/body-disposal/. Read on, and find that 30,000 cremation per month is a conservative **estimate** of the capacity of Auschwitz crematories. Googling it, it takes 1 to 3 hours to cremate a body. So JosephGoebbels, your cartoon ia utter rubbish. As for burying them, that's the easy part. Stalin, Mao, and Pol Pot had no problem, and neither would the Nazis.

Except for the fact that no one ever investigated them under the same scrutiny that Germany faced. Why IS it that Jewish crimes go unmentioned in the media, or are just dismissed without prosecution? ![](https://files.catbox.moe/1hmme8.jpg) ![](https://files.catbox.moe/j8b68w.jpg)
body_html:
1/ The Holocaust is the most documented genocide event in world history. It is on the same level as denying the moon landing and other conspiracy theories: in the face of overwhelming evidence, there are still people who manage to deny everything and cling onto questions that have already been answered a million times.

Except in both cases they admit they faked it to a certain degree. Theres movie footage of the moon landing where the flag is blowing in the wind. They didn't know yet that the moon as no air, hence there wouldn't be wind. Only then did they admit they faked it "to stifle the Russian's attempt to beat us to the moon". My grandpa was alive and well back in 1964, and even he doubted the validity of it. Same applies for the alleged holocaust.

In addition, the very term "conspiracy theorist" was weaponized by the CIA in 1967 to denounce anyone questioning the narrative of an official report.

The International Military Tribunal made a film, "The Nazi Concentration Camps", showing footage that the Allies took when they first entered the concentration camps, about 1 hr long: https://www.c-span.org/video/?400657-1/nazi-concentration-prison-camps.

If this were a court case, under cross examination, can it be proven that the movie footage was actually taken as they entered the camp and not after they seized control of the camps? Also, if it was a death camp, why did they have amenities and creature comforts? In addition, the Nuremberg Trials declared the Jews didn't need proof of their claims but the Nazis on trail did.

The shear amount of footage, the enormous number of Holocaust survivors who has provided first hand eyewitness accounts, and the existing evidence that exists in the form of Auschwitz and other concentration camps, is so vast and massive that it takes nothing other than complete willful ignorance to deny.

Problem: Jews themselves admitted to lying and the photos were exposed as fakes. Many of the stories, when put into practicality, are flat out ridiculous.

One good website I've found is https://www.ushmm.org/antisemitism/holocaust-denial-and-distortion/evidence-documentation-holocaust.

Before I look at that, I first have to ask about the organization itself. Who owns it, who controls it, what's their background? And will I find any common denominators?

Another good article: https://www.bbc.co.uk/history/worldwars/genocide/deniers_01.shtml

BBC happens to be owned and controlled by Jews, of course they'll dismiss any questioning of their official story. You will find this with most mainstream news sources.

All the questions here have already been answered, but in the spirit of free discussion and Ruqqus, I indulge you.

Answering the cremation question: https://phdn.org/archives/holocaust-history.org/auschwitz/body-disposal/. Read on, and find that 30,000 cremation per month is a conservative estimate of the capacity of Auschwitz crematories. Googling it, it takes 1 to 3 hours to cremate a body. So JosephGoebbels, your cartoon ia utter rubbish. As for burying them, that's the easy part. Stalin, Mao, and Pol Pot had no problem, and neither would the Nazis.

Except for the fact that no one ever investigated them under the same scrutiny that Germany faced. Why IS it that Jewish crimes go unmentioned in the media, or are just dismissed without prosecution?

body:
You bring up a good point; the war lasted 5 years. (Which confirms you never watched the video I linked). Hitler offered peace terms to Churchill 25 times through out the war, even while occupying Paris. The communications were found the the National Archives. He **went so far as to embrace England as a sovereign state which its existence is necessary for Europe**, and he **offered German military support to all hostile agents who threaten British sovereignty, including Russia** who Hitler was allied with at the time. This is a fact that David Irving found that could not be debunked. 

So question; if Churchill hadn't snubbed him each time, if he had taken Hitler's generous peace offering without conditions, wouldn't Churchill be personally responsible for prolonging the war, thus costing millions more lives?

I also further clarified something important in another comment, but I'll re-iterate: These weren't just trains estimated to be full of people. These are numbers that come from train capacity *cross-referenced* with deportation records.

body:
That's only the ovens. Read on in the article, and open air burnings, mass graves, and burning pits were used too, which can more than make up the difference.

EDIT to include my calculation from my next post in case people are too lazy to click the continue link: 

46 ovens in Auschwitz, at a very low 26 people per day (later in the article, read that multiple-body burning at the same time could reduce the time down to 25 minutes per body, but let's stick with the conservative numbers for now): 46x26 = 1196 per day, x30 = 35,880 per month. Per year, x12 = 430,560. Lets say over 3 years, x3 =1,291,680. I think that's enough.

And that is not even including 1941, it's just the ovens, no outside body burning or mass graves, and assuming the estimate of 26 people per day per oven without multiple body burnings per oven, which could bring it down to 25 minutes per body.

Per year, x12 = 430,560. Lets say over 3 years, x3 =1,291,680. I think that's enough.

And that is not even including 1941, it's just the ovens, no outside body burning or mass graves, and assuming the estimate of 26 people per day per oven without multiple body burnings per oven, which could bring it down to 25 minutes per body.

parent.body:
Yes, I'm sure some dirty Israeli politicians pulled the Holocaust card to get ahead. Ironically, Israel was hardly targeted.

I want to address your last meme though because I think it's important - we have a whole bunch of different sources, on a *global* scale, during a time of education and economic growth. The number of people surveyed was drastically increasing. Can we get a more accurate measurment?

[Sort of?](https://www.pewresearch.org/fact-tank/2015/02/09/europes-jewish-population/) It's non-trivial to find purely European Jewish population without going into [existing](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/List_of_genocides_by_death_toll#cite_note-4) sources, but if you want to just look at reported numbers you go right back to [6 million](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/List_of_genocides_by_death_toll)

(and, by the way, these sources are much more detailed than the "National Council of Churches 1930 World Jewish Population" which I can't even find)

At the start many inmates were first shipped into one place, then with another group other place, and then killed at the third place; "yes I'll just wait for my turn." works if you assume that there is another, better location and that's what soldiers were told, that's what soldiers told the rest. Also for the original comment you should know that many Jews died at the hands of the occupying armies in the initial takings of the cities - Odessa as an example.

body:
46 ovens in Auschwitz, at a very low 26 people per day (later in the article, read that multiple-body burning at the same time could reduce the time down to 25 minutes per body, but let's stick with the conservative numbers for now): 46x26 = 1196 per day, x30 = 35,880 per month. Per year, x12 = 430,560. Lets say over 3 years, x3 =1,291,680. I think that's enough.

And that is not even including 1941, it's just the ovens, no outside body burning or mass graves, and assuming the estimate of 26 people per day per oven without multiple body burnings per oven, which could bring it down to 25 minutes per body.

Per year, x12 = 430,560. Lets say over 3 years, x3 =1,291,680. I think that's enough.

And that is not even including 1941, it's just the ovens, no outside body burning or mass graves, and assuming the estimate of 26 people per day per oven without multiple body burnings per oven, which could bring it down to 25 minutes per body.

body:
The Typhus outbreak doesn't even come close to explaining why they needed to create _46 more ovens_ in the summer of 1942. The incomplete death books from Auschwitz record 69,000 death certificates between August 1941 to December 1943, and show only 2060 of the 68,864 deaths were from typhus. Typhus isn't necessarily that lethal, "Death occurs in no more than 4 percent of cases, according to an article in Clinical Infectious Diseases." [source](https://www.healthline.com/health/typhus). 

[source for above numbers](https://phdn.org/archives/holocaust-history.org/auschwitz/body-disposal/), which itself is well sourced with a solid bibliography. Memes are not evidence @
JosephGoebbels

body:
Not to go off topic into the whole moon landing, but the simple explanation is the astronauts unfurled the flag and it just stayed there. So there goes that conspiracy. 

Your response is interesting, because you doubt the film from the Nuremburg trials, question the sourcing for the websites I linked, and dismiss BBC as owned and controlled by the Jews. Yet you trust in the validity of memes and screenshots. How do you know all of your memes and screenshots have been faked? How can I trust them? 

You dismiss every single piece of evidence I cite just because you think they are biased. Of course they are biased, you are too. And so are your screenshots. 

Still hanging in the air is a response to my answer to the cremation question. The 30,000 per month estimate comes from Holocaust deniers Arthur Butz and Carlo Mattogno, and is lower because 1. they are deniers, but 2. there are other estimates that argue more, especially that can be calculated from instead of cremating 1 adult human body in 1 hour, and instead 1 body in 25 minutes which the article argues is possible with burning multiple at the same time. 

Sticking with the 30,000 number per month for now, x12 = 360,000. Lets say over 3 years, x3 =1,080,000 which is not that far off from the 1.1 million death toll. And that's _only the ovens_, and after 1942, and doesn't include open air burnings or burning pits which were also used. So the possibility of cremation is _very possible_.

Therefore, my response on how wrong your cartoon is still stands. 


---

You bring up rhetorical points that are peripheral to the Holocaust topic, and I don't want to get derailed here, but I need to have a quick response: 

"Except for the fact that no one ever investigated them under the same scrutiny that Germany faced." Is about my Stalin, Mao, and Pol Pot question, which I admit is peripheral to the main discussion. They weren't questioned because they didn't lose in the same way that Germany did. Germany fought a direct battle with the Allies, and in order to defeat Germany, the Allies had to invade and take over the country. And yes there was going to be more investigation because the Allies had more information, because they conquered the place, unlike what happened with the Soviet Union and China, which haven't been invaded in the last century. 

"Why IS it that Jewish crimes go unmentioned in the media?" Um I'm not sure if you're reading the same mainstream media I am, but I always see articles claiming "Israel just killed innocent Palestinian civilians", and "Israel is guilty of war crimes", and this is coming from the so-called "Jewish media" that you claim defends them all the time.

> 1/ The Holocaust is the most documented genocide event in world history. It is on the same level as denying the moon landing and other conspiracy theories: in the face of overwhelming evidence, there are still people who manage to deny everything and cling onto questions that have already been answered a million times.

Except in **both** cases they admit they faked it to a certain degree. Theres movie footage of the moon landing where the flag is blowing in the wind. They didn't know yet that the moon as no air, hence there wouldn't be wind. Only **then** did they admit they faked it "to stifle the Russian's attempt to beat us to the moon". My grandpa was alive and well back in 1964, and even he doubted the validity of it. Same applies for the alleged holocaust. ![](https://files.catbox.moe/kscc94.png) 

In addition, the very term "conspiracy theorist" was weaponized by the CIA in 1967 to denounce anyone [questioning the narrative of an official report](https://www.topsecretwriters.com/2018/02/cia-invented-term-conspiracy-theory-discredit/). 

> The International Military Tribunal made a film, "The Nazi Concentration Camps", showing footage that the Allies took when they first entered the concentration camps, about 1 hr long: https://www.c-span.org/video/?400657-1/nazi-concentration-prison-camps.

If this were a court case, under cross examination, can it be proven that the movie footage was actually taken **as they entered the camp** and not **after they seized control of the camps**? Also, if it was a death camp, why did they have amenities and creature comforts? ![](https://files.catbox.moe/8aq4dc.png) In addition, the Nuremberg Trials declared the **Jews didn't need proof of their claims** but the Nazis on trail did. ![](https://files.catbox.moe/xaizac.png)

> The shear amount of footage, the enormous number of Holocaust survivors who has provided first hand eyewitness accounts, and the existing evidence that exists in the form of Auschwitz and other concentration camps, is so vast and massive that it takes nothing other than complete willful ignorance to deny.

Problem: Jews themselves admitted to lying and the photos were exposed as fakes. ![](https://files.catbox.moe/giv45g.jpg) ![](https://files.catbox.moe/zv33hd.jpg) Many of the stories, when put into practicality, are flat out ridiculous. ![](https://files.catbox.moe/gs9odv.jpg) ![](https://files.catbox.moe/sun7fd.png) ![](https://files.catbox.moe/hwsc8y.jpg)

> One good website I've found is https://www.ushmm.org/antisemitism/holocaust-denial-and-distortion/evidence-documentation-holocaust. 

Before I look at that, I first have to ask about the organization itself. Who owns it, who controls it, what's their background? And will I find any common denominators? 

> Another good article: https://www.bbc.co.uk/history/worldwars/genocide/deniers_01.shtml

BBC happens to be owned and controlled by Jews, of course they'll dismiss any questioning of their official story. You will find this with most mainstream news sources. ![](https://files.catbox.moe/r4j72e.JPG)

> All the questions here have already been answered, but in the spirit of free discussion and Ruqqus, I indulge you.

> Answering the cremation question: https://phdn.org/archives/holocaust-history.org/auschwitz/body-disposal/. Read on, and find that 30,000 cremation per month is a conservative **estimate** of the capacity of Auschwitz crematories. Googling it, it takes 1 to 3 hours to cremate a body. So JosephGoebbels, your cartoon ia utter rubbish. As for burying them, that's the easy part. Stalin, Mao, and Pol Pot had no problem, and neither would the Nazis.

Except for the fact that no one ever investigated them under the same scrutiny that Germany faced. Why IS it that Jewish crimes go unmentioned in the media, or are just dismissed without prosecution? ![](https://files.catbox.moe/1hmme8.jpg) ![](https://files.catbox.moe/j8b68w.jpg)

1/ The Holocaust is the most documented genocide event in world history. It is on the same level as denying the moon landing and other conspiracy theories: in the face of overwhelming evidence, there are still people who manage to deny everything and cling onto questions that have already been answered a million times.

Except in both cases they admit they faked it to a certain degree. Theres movie footage of the moon landing where the flag is blowing in the wind. They didn't know yet that the moon as no air, hence there wouldn't be wind. Only then did they admit they faked it "to stifle the Russian's attempt to beat us to the moon". My grandpa was alive and well back in 1964, and even he doubted the validity of it. Same applies for the alleged holocaust.

In addition, the very term "conspiracy theorist" was weaponized by the CIA in 1967 to denounce anyone questioning the narrative of an official report.

The International Military Tribunal made a film, "The Nazi Concentration Camps", showing footage that the Allies took when they first entered the concentration camps, about 1 hr long: https://www.c-span.org/video/?400657-1/nazi-concentration-prison-camps.

If this were a court case, under cross examination, can it be proven that the movie footage was actually taken as they entered the camp and not after they seized control of the camps? Also, if it was a death camp, why did they have amenities and creature comforts? In addition, the Nuremberg Trials declared the Jews didn't need proof of their claims but the Nazis on trail did.

The shear amount of footage, the enormous number of Holocaust survivors who has provided first hand eyewitness accounts, and the existing evidence that exists in the form of Auschwitz and other concentration camps, is so vast and massive that it takes nothing other than complete willful ignorance to deny.

Problem: Jews themselves admitted to lying and the photos were exposed as fakes. Many of the stories, when put into practicality, are flat out ridiculous.

One good website I've found is https://www.ushmm.org/antisemitism/holocaust-denial-and-distortion/evidence-documentation-holocaust.

Before I look at that, I first have to ask about the organization itself. Who owns it, who controls it, what's their background? And will I find any common denominators?

Another good article: https://www.bbc.co.uk/history/worldwars/genocide/deniers_01.shtml

BBC happens to be owned and controlled by Jews, of course they'll dismiss any questioning of their official story. You will find this with most mainstream news sources.

All the questions here have already been answered, but in the spirit of free discussion and Ruqqus, I indulge you.

Answering the cremation question: https://phdn.org/archives/holocaust-history.org/auschwitz/body-disposal/. Read on, and find that 30,000 cremation per month is a conservative estimate of the capacity of Auschwitz crematories. Googling it, it takes 1 to 3 hours to cremate a body. So JosephGoebbels, your cartoon ia utter rubbish. As for burying them, that's the easy part. Stalin, Mao, and Pol Pot had no problem, and neither would the Nazis.

Except for the fact that no one ever investigated them under the same scrutiny that Germany faced. Why IS it that Jewish crimes go unmentioned in the media, or are just dismissed without prosecution?

parent.body:
That's only the ovens. Read on in the article, and open air burnings, mass graves, and burning pits were used too, which can more than make up the difference.

EDIT to include my calculation from my next post in case people are too lazy to click the continue link: 

46 ovens in Auschwitz, at a very low 26 people per day (later in the article, read that multiple-body burning at the same time could reduce the time down to 25 minutes per body, but let's stick with the conservative numbers for now): 46x26 = 1196 per day, x30 = 35,880 per month. Per year, x12 = 430,560. Lets say over 3 years, x3 =1,291,680. I think that's enough.

And that is not even including 1941, it's just the ovens, no outside body burning or mass graves, and assuming the estimate of 26 people per day per oven without multiple body burnings per oven, which could bring it down to 25 minutes per body.

body:
> Not to go off topic into the whole moon landing, but the simple explanation is the astronauts unfurled the flag and it just stayed there. So there goes that conspiracy.

Actually, ironically enough it was a program on TV that I saw years ago showing the flag flapping in the wind like it would on Earth. The narrator stated it was propaganda film for the Russians so they wouldn't continue the race to the moon, since they already beat us into space. It seems to have been stifled now, I just did several searches for it to no avail. But aside that point, the photos don't have a horizontal horizon. There's also the "takeoff" footage where the camera is following the pod, but... Who's operating the camera? Did he bring his own ride? 

> Your response is interesting, because you doubt the film from the Nuremburg trials, question the sourcing for the websites I linked, and dismiss BBC as owned and controlled by the Jews. Yet you trust in the validity of memes and screenshots. How do you know all of your memes and screenshots have been faked? How can I trust them?

Because I have years of research into this, and one of the more credible sources, David Irving, exposed that many of these mainstream "credible" historians were really just going around quoting eachother. Irving stated, "I have the document, and your Hitler Diaries are faked! I can prove he wasn't even IN the country at that time!" That sent them into a panic, so instead of proving him wrong or conceding, they attacked his personal character. He was sued, cut off from publishers, protested when he'd speak at events, his house broken into and his documents stolen, he was even put in prison for pointing out that the Chimney at the supposed crematorium wasn't even attached to the building, and they called it a "replica". So he stated "[If I pay my bills with a 'replica' $100 bill, I'd go to prison because it's a fake](https://www.bitchute.com/video/8MjLm3YKawz3/)." He also [debunks the holocaust in 3 minutes](https://www.bitchute.com/video/K8hflhuRBuE5/) 

The Nuremberg Trials will show you the propaganda videos of Nazis "confessing" but they won't tell you about the torture they endured.  [Case in point](https://www.nationalisti.ro/jewish-prosecutor-at-nuremberg-claims-he-saw-vengeful-jews-torture-and-burn-ss-man-alive-in-oven/) I've also shown the Jews didn't need proof, but the Germans did. If you think that's an honest, fair judicial system; you're just as bad as you claim Nazis to be. Hitler wasn't the only one to despise Jews either. ![](https://files.catbox.moe/hc5za0.jpg) Henry Ford wrote "The International Jew" before Hitler wrote Mein Kampf. 

If you claim that Jews aren't capable, then look no further than their ritual murders through out history. ![](https://files.catbox.moe/h75m3k.png). 

> You dismiss every single piece of evidence I cite just because you think they are biased. Of course they are biased, you are too. And so are your screenshots.

There's bias, where facts are ignored - and that seems to be what you are doing, then there's seeing another side to history which my images do. The sources you cite are all owned by Jews, that is not by accident. You don't think it's odd that 2% of the population are over represented to the tune of 3,000% in media, politics, and banking? Some will come right out and admit their guilt because they know they've consolidated so much power, who's to stop them anymore? Who do you think started **both** world wars? ![](https://files.catbox.moe/fonzpn.JPG) ![](https://files.catbox.moe/evgpf7.jpg) 

> Still hanging in the air is a response to my answer to the cremation question. The 30,000 per month estimate comes from Holocaust deniers Arthur Butz and Carlo Mattogno, and is lower because 1. they are deniers, but 2. there are other estimates that argue more, especially that can be calculated from instead of cremating 1 adult human body in 1 hour, and instead 1 body in 25 minutes which the article argues is possible with burning multiple at the same time.

Your Zimmerman source is flawed because he's completely biased in his work and cites no credible sources. To date, **no authentic wartime document exists proving the crematoriums existed to that scale**. The chimney wasn't in the wartime photographs, in fact it wasn't even built until 1947. Show me the purchase orders, the cost, the orders to ship, the orders to kill, anything. Show me the manufacturer that built them. Explain why there wasn't massive piles of coal to fuel them in the aerial photographs the allies took at the time. You said: 

> The Holocaust is the most documented genocide event in world history

Well explain why the Holodomor wasn't. 66 MILLION murdered under communism, and it appears to be the **least** documented genocide in history despite being the largest **in human history**. Explain why these "death camps" had a birthing center, dental office, swimming pools, and a theater. ![](https://files.catbox.moe/8aq4dc.png) ![](https://files.catbox.moe/v80u42.jpg)

> Sticking with the 30,000 number per month for now, x12 = 360,000. Lets say over 3 years, x3 =1,080,000 which is not that far off from the 1.1 million death toll. And that's only the ovens, and after 1942, and doesn't include open air burnings or burning pits which were also used. So the possibility of cremation is very possible.

Yet still not proven, the mass graves were never found. Then there's the witness testimonies, why are they so far fetched? ![](https://files.catbox.moe/6jp33x.png) ![](https://files.catbox.moe/sun7fd.png) Then there's the fact the plaque originally said 4 million, and was later changed to 1 million. Why would this happen? 

> Therefore, my response on how wrong your cartoon is still stands.

In your own mind, much like the Jewish interpretation of the holocaust ![](https://files.catbox.moe/giv45g.jpg) 

> You bring up rhetorical points that are peripheral to the Holocaust topic, and I don't want to get derailed here, but I need to have a quick response:

> "Except for the fact that no one ever investigated them under the same scrutiny that Germany faced." Is about my Stalin, Mao, and Pol Pot question, which I admit is peripheral to the main discussion. They weren't questioned because they didn't lose in the same way that Germany did. Germany fought a direct battle with the Allies, and in order to defeat Germany, the Allies had to invade and take over the country. And yes there was going to be more investigation because the Allies had more information, because they conquered the place, unlike what happened with the Soviet Union and China, which haven't been invaded in the last century.

There's still holes to fill though, like **why** did **free countries** like the UK, France, USA, etc. **align with COMMUNIST countries like Russia and China**? Who really won the war? What was Hitler doing that was SO BAD, it took the entire world to stop him? When you compare "war crimes" Stalin was far worse on a genocidal scale. (BTW, did you know he was Jewish?) ![](https://de.catbox.moe/x2r0g7.jpg) Mao was backed by Jews, as was Poland's Marxist leader, and every communist dictator that comes to power. I go back to Winston Churchill's [article](http://nationalvanguard.org/wp-content/uploads/2015/01/Illustrated_Sunday_Herald_Winston_Churchill-Zionism_versus_Bolshevism.jpg) where he explains the communist dictator is just a front, their power pales into comparison of their Jewish backers. From Castro, to Mao, Stalin and Lenin, they all had Jewish financiers. This is because they want puppets on a string to dangle in front of the masses to play the role of the villain, that way if there's a coup or an assassination, only the politician pays the price and the ones pulling the strings behind the curtain are protected. They can just fund opposition to come in and replace the removed parties.  

> "Why IS it that Jewish crimes go unmentioned in the media?" Um I'm not sure if you're reading the same mainstream media I am, but I always see articles claiming "Israel just killed innocent Palestinian civilians", and "Israel is guilty of war crimes", and this is coming from the so-called "Jewish media" that you claim defends them all the time. 

Link to sources? Sometimes if they're out of Israel or perhaps Al Jazeera I might see some, but based in the US? Notta one. Sometimes they'll admit to it when boasting, but it's pretty rare. As far as WWII goes, there are very rare sources that will tattle on their agenda. There's a misconception that Nazis think **all** jews are bad, that's propaganda. There's plenty of good jews out there, but they should be deploring the cabal like good Italians deplored the mafia. Let me link you to some good Jews: 

Benjamin Freedman: He said Jews were to blame [for BOTH world wars because they wanted to take Israel from the Arabs who had it 2,000 years](https://www.bitchute.com/video/exi1Ceh2Mam1/). He also defended Germany's role in both world wars. Now, it's a lengthy video and I don't expect you to watch it right away (more likely you won't at all) but it's interesting insight from a man who was in a position to know what was going on at the top levels. He was in meetings with the president, he watched Jews "beat it into Woodrow Wilson's head that the US needs to join the first world war". 

David Cole: Inspects Auschwitz and [debunks the gas chambers](https://www.bitchute.com/video/5MDSZQYFoCyY/). Earnst Zundel was a Canadian who testified that the operation was a fake, in a Canadian court case. David Irving gave testimony confirming Zundel's findings from a technical and practical standpoint with historical findings that coincided with what he found. Both later were thrown in prison for making true statements. 

If you have the guts to listen to what they're saying, you'll find shocking new facts that were stifled from the mainstream press.

It seems to have been stifled now, I just did several searches for it to no avail. But aside that point, the photos don't have a horizontal horizon. There's also the "takeoff" footage where the camera is following the pod, but... Who's operating the camera? Did he bring his own ride?

Your response is interesting, because you doubt the film from the Nuremburg trials, question the sourcing for the websites I linked, and dismiss BBC as owned and controlled by the Jews. Yet you trust in the validity of memes and screenshots. How do you know all of your memes and screenshots have been faked? How can I trust them?

Because I have years of research into this, and one of the more credible sources, David Irving, exposed that many of these mainstream "credible" historians were really just going around quoting eachother. Irving stated, "I have the document, and your Hitler Diaries are faked! I can prove he wasn't even IN the country at that time!" That sent them into a panic, so instead of proving him wrong or conceding, they attacked his personal character. He was sued, cut off from publishers, protested when he'd speak at events, his house broken into and his documents stolen, he was even put in prison for pointing out that the Chimney at the supposed crematorium wasn't even attached to the building, and they called it a "replica". So he stated "If I pay my bills with a 'replica' $100 bill, I'd go to prison because it's a fake." He also debunks the holocaust in 3 minutes

The Nuremberg Trials will show you the propaganda videos of Nazis "confessing" but they won't tell you about the torture they endured. Case in point I've also shown the Jews didn't need proof, but the Germans did. If you think that's an honest, fair judicial system; you're just as bad as you claim Nazis to be. Hitler wasn't the only one to despise Jews either. Henry Ford wrote "The International Jew" before Hitler wrote Mein Kampf.

If you claim that Jews aren't capable, then look no further than their ritual murders through out history. .

You dismiss every single piece of evidence I cite just because you think they are biased. Of course they are biased, you are too. And so are your screenshots.

There's bias, where facts are ignored - and that seems to be what you are doing, then there's seeing another side to history which my images do. The sources you cite are all owned by Jews, that is not by accident. You don't think it's odd that 2% of the population are over represented to the tune of 3,000% in media, politics, and banking? Some will come right out and admit their guilt because they know they've consolidated so much power, who's to stop them anymore? Who do you think started both world wars?

Still hanging in the air is a response to my answer to the cremation question. The 30,000 per month estimate comes from Holocaust deniers Arthur Butz and Carlo Mattogno, and is lower because 1. they are deniers, but 2. there are other estimates that argue more, especially that can be calculated from instead of cremating 1 adult human body in 1 hour, and instead 1 body in 25 minutes which the article argues is possible with burning multiple at the same time.

Your Zimmerman source is flawed because he's completely biased in his work and cites no credible sources. To date, no authentic wartime document exists proving the crematoriums existed to that scale. The chimney wasn't in the wartime photographs, in fact it wasn't even built until 1947. Show me the purchase orders, the cost, the orders to ship, the orders to kill, anything. Show me the manufacturer that built them. Explain why there wasn't massive piles of coal to fuel them in the aerial photographs the allies took at the time. You said:

The Holocaust is the most documented genocide event in world history

Well explain why the Holodomor wasn't. 66 MILLION murdered under communism, and it appears to be the least documented genocide in history despite being the largest in human history. Explain why these "death camps" had a birthing center, dental office, swimming pools, and a theater.

Sticking with the 30,000 number per month for now, x12 = 360,000. Lets say over 3 years, x3 =1,080,000 which is not that far off from the 1.1 million death toll. And that's only the ovens, and after 1942, and doesn't include open air burnings or burning pits which were also used. So the possibility of cremation is very possible.

Yet still not proven, the mass graves were never found. Then there's the witness testimonies, why are they so far fetched? Then there's the fact the plaque originally said 4 million, and was later changed to 1 million. Why would this happen?

Therefore, my response on how wrong your cartoon is still stands.

In your own mind, much like the Jewish interpretation of the holocaust

You bring up rhetorical points that are peripheral to the Holocaust topic, and I don't want to get derailed here, but I need to have a quick response:

"Except for the fact that no one ever investigated them under the same scrutiny that Germany faced." Is about my Stalin, Mao, and Pol Pot question, which I admit is peripheral to the main discussion. They weren't questioned because they didn't lose in the same way that Germany did. Germany fought a direct battle with the Allies, and in order to defeat Germany, the Allies had to invade and take over the country. And yes there was going to be more investigation because the Allies had more information, because they conquered the place, unlike what happened with the Soviet Union and China, which haven't been invaded in the last century.

There's still holes to fill though, like why did free countries like the UK, France, USA, etc. align with COMMUNIST countries like Russia and China? Who really won the war? What was Hitler doing that was SO BAD, it took the entire world to stop him? When you compare "war crimes" Stalin was far worse on a genocidal scale. (BTW, did you know he was Jewish?) Mao was backed by Jews, as was Poland's Marxist leader, and every communist dictator that comes to power. I go back to Winston Churchill's article where he explains the communist dictator is just a front, their power pales into comparison of their Jewish backers. From Castro, to Mao, Stalin and Lenin, they all had Jewish financiers. This is because they want puppets on a string to dangle in front of the masses to play the role of the villain, that way if there's a coup or an assassination, only the politician pays the price and the ones pulling the strings behind the curtain are protected. They can just fund opposition to come in and replace the removed parties.

"Why IS it that Jewish crimes go unmentioned in the media?" Um I'm not sure if you're reading the same mainstream media I am, but I always see articles claiming "Israel just killed innocent Palestinian civilians", and "Israel is guilty of war crimes", and this is coming from the so-called "Jewish media" that you claim defends them all the time.

Link to sources? Sometimes if they're out of Israel or perhaps Al Jazeera I might see some, but based in the US? Notta one. Sometimes they'll admit to it when boasting, but it's pretty rare. As far as WWII goes, there are very rare sources that will tattle on their agenda. There's a misconception that Nazis think all jews are bad, that's propaganda. There's plenty of good jews out there, but they should be deploring the cabal like good Italians deplored the mafia. Let me link you to some good Jews:

Benjamin Freedman: He said Jews were to blame for BOTH world wars because they wanted to take Israel from the Arabs who had it 2,000 years. He also defended Germany's role in both world wars. Now, it's a lengthy video and I don't expect you to watch it right away (more likely you won't at all) but it's interesting insight from a man who was in a position to know what was going on at the top levels. He was in meetings with the president, he watched Jews "beat it into Woodrow Wilson's head that the US needs to join the first world war".

David Cole: Inspects Auschwitz and debunks the gas chambers. Earnst Zundel was a Canadian who testified that the operation was a fake, in a Canadian court case. David Irving gave testimony confirming Zundel's findings from a technical and practical standpoint with historical findings that coincided with what he found. Both later were thrown in prison for making true statements.

If you have the guts to listen to what they're saying, you'll find shocking new facts that were stifled from the mainstream press.

body:
> In 3 clicks I can find a jew.

That's just basic math -

1.45% of the US is Jewish, average popular Wikipedia page links 10 or so other people, so by one hop you're at 13% chance of finding a Jew, 2 hops you're 79% chance of finding a Jew, and at 3 hops you're well over 99% (used binomial probability calculator [here](https://stattrek.com/online-calculator/binomial.aspx))

Even if we take the global Jew population (0.2%) to expand outside of the USA, the Wikipedia page has a 2% chance of being connected to a Jew, 20% of being connected after a hop, and 89% chance after 3 hops.

Let's be even more stingy - lets say each person is only *closely* connected to 4 people in the US. At 3 hops, you're still at 70% chance that someone is a Jew.

body:
Ok I'm starting to see a pattern here, and why it's impossible to debate with a conspiracy theorist. Basically _anything_ I cite is a flawed source, meanwhile your beloved David Irving is the embodiment of truth with no ulterior motive. So, how does it feel when I dismiss everything you've cited?  Let's see: 

> "There's bias, where facts are ignored "

Um like you're ignoring the facts?

> "He also debunks the holocaust in 3 minutes"

I think he's just making that up for attention. 

> " Case in point I've also shown the Jews didn't need proof, but the Germans did."

I don't know, looks like a Nazi-sympathizing source. They are probably lying. 

> "Henry Ford wrote "The International Jew" before Hitler wrote Mein Kampf."

Yep there has always been a number of people who hate the Jews because they are jealous of their success. 

>"Your Zimmerman source is flawed because he's completely biased in his work and cites no credible sources." 

He cites 327 sources, it's unbelievable to see you just blanket statement against that. 

> "The sources you cite are all owned by Jews, that is not by accident."

Um no, To think that there is a homogeneous, well-defined group of Jewish individuals at the top of media who deliberately try to defend Israel is ridiculous. Sure there is rich, big city leftist group of individuals but they aren't defined by Judiasm. And the ones who are ethnically Jewish are so far removed from their original Judiasm they are just Europeans or Americans. And many of them hate Israel! They call Israel an apartheid state, and say it is guilty of war crimes, and needs to agree to the two-state solution which would end Israel as we know it. How you people think that the media is for Israel, when they are actually _actively working against Israel_, is beyond me. How did you not see the hate against Trump and Netanyahu when they were in the news together? Maybe it's your confirmation bias that denies anything you disagree with. 

*your so-called Jewish media threw a fit when Trump moved the embassy to Jerusalem!* 

> "Explain why these "death camps" had a birthing center, dental office, swimming pools, and a theater."

Why do I get a feeling that you just picked some random photos from Germany at the time and threw them into a screenshot? Hmm... that's my conspiracy theory. 

> "No authentic wartime document exists proving the crematoriums existed to that scale" 

I'm going to need you to cite an unbiased source saying that is true. Oh wait, you can't. 

> "Yet still not proven, the mass graves were never found."

You have to have more to doubt than just that, something more to go off of. 

>"Then there's the witness testimonies, why are they so far fetched?"

They seem pretty strongly corroboratory, and all say, I don't know, the Holocaust happened!

> "There's still holes to fill though, like why did free countries like the UK, France, USA, etc. align with COMMUNIST countries like Russia and China?"

That is such a simple question to answer, I can't believe you have to ask it. Maybe because _the Nazis attacked France and Britain, and were allied with Japan who attacked us?_ That question alone should prove you're an idiot. Your rhetorical questions are not arguments. 

* To continue believing in your position, you'd have to think that all the Allies (British, French, and Americans) were in on it and didn't snitch, and no soldiers did. They must have planted all this, and there is no evidence of them planing information. It's just a wild guess that you throw out there. This is what is wrong with conspiracy theories. There is no way that so many Allied troops and Holocaust survivors would agree with the same story if all of this evidence is planted. 

Let me treat David Irving the same way you treat all the evidence I've cited. David Irving is just an attention seeker who makes up what he talks about, and took advantage of a neat conspiracy to dupe people like you. So are David Cole and Earnst Zundel. There, your sources are flawed now. 

Your entire previous post is just a smoke screen to dismiss and doubt a thousand reliable sources. This is how conspiracy theories like yours exist. 

I can have a reasonable discussion, but apparently you aren't able to get past your rhetorical questions and affinity to dismissing anything that contradicts you. 

I'll make my way through the "evidence" you've cited eventually, but the way that you've shown a lack of coherent thinking makes me feel like this discussion will never go anywhere. It will always just be you questioning anything I cite as made up by the grand coalition of Allies and Jews, plus the Holocaust survivors, plus the armies that went in. You've taken up enough time of my day, I've even taken some time out of my work hours to respond to your posts, but now I see that is futile.

parent.body:
> Not to go off topic into the whole moon landing, but the simple explanation is the astronauts unfurled the flag and it just stayed there. So there goes that conspiracy.

Actually, ironically enough it was a program on TV that I saw years ago showing the flag flapping in the wind like it would on Earth. The narrator stated it was propaganda film for the Russians so they wouldn't continue the race to the moon, since they already beat us into space. It seems to have been stifled now, I just did several searches for it to no avail. But aside that point, the photos don't have a horizontal horizon. There's also the "takeoff" footage where the camera is following the pod, but... Who's operating the camera? Did he bring his own ride? 

> Your response is interesting, because you doubt the film from the Nuremburg trials, question the sourcing for the websites I linked, and dismiss BBC as owned and controlled by the Jews. Yet you trust in the validity of memes and screenshots. How do you know all of your memes and screenshots have been faked? How can I trust them?

Because I have years of research into this, and one of the more credible sources, David Irving, exposed that many of these mainstream "credible" historians were really just going around quoting eachother. Irving stated, "I have the document, and your Hitler Diaries are faked! I can prove he wasn't even IN the country at that time!" That sent them into a panic, so instead of proving him wrong or conceding, they attacked his personal character. He was sued, cut off from publishers, protested when he'd speak at events, his house broken into and his documents stolen, he was even put in prison for pointing out that the Chimney at the supposed crematorium wasn't even attached to the building, and they called it a "replica". So he stated "[If I pay my bills with a 'replica' $100 bill, I'd go to prison because it's a fake](https://www.bitchute.com/video/8MjLm3YKawz3/)." He also [debunks the holocaust in 3 minutes](https://www.bitchute.com/video/K8hflhuRBuE5/) 

The Nuremberg Trials will show you the propaganda videos of Nazis "confessing" but they won't tell you about the torture they endured.  [Case in point](https://www.nationalisti.ro/jewish-prosecutor-at-nuremberg-claims-he-saw-vengeful-jews-torture-and-burn-ss-man-alive-in-oven/) I've also shown the Jews didn't need proof, but the Germans did. If you think that's an honest, fair judicial system; you're just as bad as you claim Nazis to be. Hitler wasn't the only one to despise Jews either. ![](https://files.catbox.moe/hc5za0.jpg) Henry Ford wrote "The International Jew" before Hitler wrote Mein Kampf. 

If you claim that Jews aren't capable, then look no further than their ritual murders through out history. ![](https://files.catbox.moe/h75m3k.png). 

> You dismiss every single piece of evidence I cite just because you think they are biased. Of course they are biased, you are too. And so are your screenshots.

There's bias, where facts are ignored - and that seems to be what you are doing, then there's seeing another side to history which my images do. The sources you cite are all owned by Jews, that is not by accident. You don't think it's odd that 2% of the population are over represented to the tune of 3,000% in media, politics, and banking? Some will come right out and admit their guilt because they know they've consolidated so much power, who's to stop them anymore? Who do you think started **both** world wars? ![](https://files.catbox.moe/fonzpn.JPG) ![](https://files.catbox.moe/evgpf7.jpg) 

> Still hanging in the air is a response to my answer to the cremation question. The 30,000 per month estimate comes from Holocaust deniers Arthur Butz and Carlo Mattogno, and is lower because 1. they are deniers, but 2. there are other estimates that argue more, especially that can be calculated from instead of cremating 1 adult human body in 1 hour, and instead 1 body in 25 minutes which the article argues is possible with burning multiple at the same time.

body:
First off, the term conspiracy theory is false because facts are involved. This is an emotional response, not one of logic and fact. I've already read your sources, and I found they didn't add up. Several critical questions need to be answered. 

- Why would a gas chamber have wooden doors? 

- Why did David Cole find a floor drain in the floor? Escaping gas would have killed the entire camp, even the guards. 

- Why did the doors have handles on the inside? 

- Why was there air gaps under the door? 

- Why does the door open inwards? If it was jam packed with bodies they wouldn't have been able to open it. 

- Why wouldn't they just line them up and shoot them like Russia did? 

- Why was the camp **kept open** after the war? Are the Allies just as guilty? 

- Why does the US receive no demonizing from Japanese camps? 

- Why did the US use Zyklon B, also known as DDT? 

This is just a start.
body_html:
First off, the term conspiracy theory is false because facts are involved. This is an emotional response, not one of logic and fact. I've already read your sources, and I found they didn't add up. Several critical questions need to be answered.

  • Why would a gas chamber have wooden doors?

  • Why did David Cole find a floor drain in the floor? Escaping gas would have killed the entire camp, even the guards.

  • Why did the doors have handles on the inside?

  • Why was there air gaps under the door?

  • Why does the door open inwards? If it was jam packed with bodies they wouldn't have been able to open it.

  • Why wouldn't they just line them up and shoot them like Russia did?

  • Why was the camp kept open after the war? Are the Allies just as guilty?

  • Why does the US receive no demonizing from Japanese camps?

  • Why did the US use Zyklon B, also known as DDT?

This is just a start.

Ok I'm starting to see a pattern here, and why it's impossible to debate with a conspiracy theorist. Basically _anything_ I cite is a flawed source, meanwhile your beloved David Irving is the embodiment of truth with no ulterior motive. So, how does it feel when I dismiss everything you've cited?  Let's see: 

> "There's bias, where facts are ignored "

Um like you're ignoring the facts?

> "He also debunks the holocaust in 3 minutes"

I think he's just making that up for attention. 

> " Case in point I've also shown the Jews didn't need proof, but the Germans did."

I don't know, looks like a Nazi-sympathizing source. They are probably lying. 

> "Henry Ford wrote "The International Jew" before Hitler wrote Mein Kampf."

Yep there has always been a number of people who hate the Jews because they are jealous of their success. 

>"Your Zimmerman source is flawed because he's completely biased in his work and cites no credible sources." 

He cites 327 sources, it's unbelievable to see you just blanket statement against that. 

> "The sources you cite are all owned by Jews, that is not by accident."

Um no, To think that there is a homogeneous, well-defined group of Jewish individuals at the top of media who deliberately try to defend Israel is ridiculous. Sure there is rich, big city leftist group of individuals but they aren't defined by Judiasm. And the ones who are ethnically Jewish are so far removed from their original Judiasm they are just Europeans or Americans. And many of them hate Israel! They call Israel an apartheid state, and say it is guilty of war crimes, and needs to agree to the two-state solution which would end Israel as we know it. How you people think that the media is for Israel, when they are actually _actively working against Israel_, is beyond me. How did you not see the hate against Trump and Netanyahu when they were in the news together? Maybe it's your confirmation bias that denies anything you disagree with. 

*your so-called Jewish media threw a fit when Trump moved the embassy to Jerusalem!* 

> "Explain why these "death camps" had a birthing center, dental office, swimming pools, and a theater."

Why do I get a feeling that you just picked some random photos from Germany at the time and threw them into a screenshot? Hmm... that's my conspiracy theory. 

> "No authentic wartime document exists proving the crematoriums existed to that scale" 

I'm going to need you to cite an unbiased source saying that is true. Oh wait, you can't. 

> "Yet still not proven, the mass graves were never found."

You have to have more to doubt than just that, something more to go off of. 

>"Then there's the witness testimonies, why are they so far fetched?"

They seem pretty strongly corroboratory, and all say, I don't know, the Holocaust happened!

> "There's still holes to fill though, like why did free countries like the UK, France, USA, etc. align with COMMUNIST countries like Russia and China?"

That is such a simple question to answer, I can't believe you have to ask it. Maybe because _the Nazis attacked France and Britain, and were allied with Japan who attacked us?_ That question alone should prove you're an idiot. Your rhetorical questions are not arguments. 

* To continue believing in your position, you'd have to think that all the Allies (British, French, and Americans) were in on it and didn't snitch, and no soldiers did. They must have planted all this, and there is no evidence of them planing information. It's just a wild guess that you throw out there. This is what is wrong with conspiracy theories. There is no way that so many Allied troops and Holocaust survivors would agree with the same story if all of this evidence is planted. 

Let me treat David Irving the same way you treat all the evidence I've cited. David Irving is just an attention seeker who makes up what he talks about, and took advantage of a neat conspiracy to dupe people like you. So are David Cole and Earnst Zundel. There, your sources are flawed now. 

Your entire previous post is just a smoke screen to dismiss and doubt a thousand reliable sources. This is how conspiracy theories like yours exist. 

I can have a reasonable discussion, but apparently you aren't able to get past your rhetorical questions and affinity to dismissing anything that contradicts you. 

I'll make my way through the "evidence" you've cited eventually, but the way that you've shown a lack of coherent thinking makes me feel like this discussion will never go anywhere. It will always just be you questioning anything I cite as made up by the grand coalition of Allies and Jews, plus the Holocaust survivors, plus the armies that went in. You've taken up enough time of my day, I've even taken some time out of my work hours to respond to your posts, but now I see that is futile.

parent.body:
> In 3 clicks I can find a jew.

That's just basic math -

1.45% of the US is Jewish, average popular Wikipedia page links 10 or so other people, so by one hop you're at 13% chance of finding a Jew, 2 hops you're 79% chance of finding a Jew, and at 3 hops you're well over 99% (used binomial probability calculator [here](https://stattrek.com/online-calculator/binomial.aspx))

Even if we take the global Jew population (0.2%) to expand outside of the USA, the Wikipedia page has a 2% chance of being connected to a Jew, 20% of being connected after a hop, and 89% chance after 3 hops.

Let's be even more stingy - lets say each person is only *closely* connected to 4 people in the US. At 3 hops, you're still at 70% chance that someone is a Jew.

parent.body:
That's only the ovens. Read on in the article, and open air burnings, mass graves, and burning pits were used too, which can more than make up the difference.

EDIT to include my calculation from my next post in case people are too lazy to click the continue link: 

46 ovens in Auschwitz, at a very low 26 people per day (later in the article, read that multiple-body burning at the same time could reduce the time down to 25 minutes per body, but let's stick with the conservative numbers for now): 46x26 = 1196 per day, x30 = 35,880 per month. Per year, x12 = 430,560. Lets say over 3 years, x3 =1,291,680. I think that's enough.

And that is not even including 1941, it's just the ovens, no outside body burning or mass graves, and assuming the estimate of 26 people per day per oven without multiple body burnings per oven, which could bring it down to 25 minutes per body.

body:
Oh you think Dresden happened? 

From your other post apparently you think asking questions is enough, so let me ask you a few questions: Could Dresden been made up? What if the Germans made it up to gain sympathy after the war? 

We can't believe the people who say they lived through the Holocaust, can we? Because they are all "in" on the plot, right? What if the Germans did the same thing with Dresden? All those people who say it happened are "in" on it? And the Germans set up the evidence in Dresden? They definitely could have set it up because the controlled the area. 

As for the Allies, isn't German ancestry the largest ancestry group in the US? And many of them fought in the war? 

Oh no! The picture is starting to come together! Because we know that it's ethnicity that counts! 

And the German Americans must have bullied the British into saying it happened! 

All that matters is the possibility! And this sounds possible, so it must be true!


P.S. You might think I'm saying all this in jest, but I'm just illustrating what happens when you make the following assumptions: 

1. We cannot trust people who lived through an event because they are all "in" on a conspiracy (Holocaust survivors, American and Allied soldiers, Germans who've admitted it)

2. All the evidence of a huge historical event can be made up by a group of people, and if that is possible, then that is enough to not believe something. 

The only reason I've gone this route is because you outright reject any of the evidence for the Holocaust on this basis.

parent.body:
Ok I'm starting to see a pattern here, and why it's impossible to debate with a conspiracy theorist. Basically _anything_ I cite is a flawed source, meanwhile your beloved David Irving is the embodiment of truth with no ulterior motive. So, how does it feel when I dismiss everything you've cited?  Let's see: 

> "There's bias, where facts are ignored "

Um like you're ignoring the facts?

> "He also debunks the holocaust in 3 minutes"

I think he's just making that up for attention. 

> " Case in point I've also shown the Jews didn't need proof, but the Germans did."

I don't know, looks like a Nazi-sympathizing source. They are probably lying. 

> "Henry Ford wrote "The International Jew" before Hitler wrote Mein Kampf."

Yep there has always been a number of people who hate the Jews because they are jealous of their success. 

>"Your Zimmerman source is flawed because he's completely biased in his work and cites no credible sources." 

He cites 327 sources, it's unbelievable to see you just blanket statement against that. 

> "The sources you cite are all owned by Jews, that is not by accident."

Um no, To think that there is a homogeneous, well-defined group of Jewish individuals at the top of media who deliberately try to defend Israel is ridiculous. Sure there is rich, big city leftist group of individuals but they aren't defined by Judiasm. And the ones who are ethnically Jewish are so far removed from their original Judiasm they are just Europeans or Americans. And many of them hate Israel! They call Israel an apartheid state, and say it is guilty of war crimes, and needs to agree to the two-state solution which would end Israel as we know it. How you people think that the media is for Israel, when they are actually _actively working against Israel_, is beyond me. How did you not see the hate against Trump and Netanyahu when they were in the news together? Maybe it's your confirmation bias that denies anything you disagree with. 

*your so-called Jewish media threw a fit when Trump moved the embassy to Jerusalem!* 

> "Explain why these "death camps" had a birthing center, dental office, swimming pools, and a theater."

Why do I get a feeling that you just picked some random photos from Germany at the time and threw them into a screenshot? Hmm... that's my conspiracy theory. 

> "No authentic wartime document exists proving the crematoriums existed to that scale" 

I'm going to need you to cite an unbiased source saying that is true. Oh wait, you can't. 

> "Yet still not proven, the mass graves were never found."

You have to have more to doubt than just that, something more to go off of. 

>"Then there's the witness testimonies, why are they so far fetched?"

They seem pretty strongly corroboratory, and all say, I don't know, the Holocaust happened!

> "There's still holes to fill though, like why did free countries like the UK, France, USA, etc. align with COMMUNIST countries like Russia and China?"

That is such a simple question to answer, I can't believe you have to ask it. Maybe because _the Nazis attacked France and Britain, and were allied with Japan who attacked us?_ That question alone should prove you're an idiot. Your rhetorical questions are not arguments. 

* To continue believing in your position, you'd have to think that all the Allies (British, French, and Americans) were in on it and didn't snitch, and no soldiers did. They must have planted all this, and there is no evidence of them planing information. It's just a wild guess that you throw out there. This is what is wrong with conspiracy theories. There is no way that so many Allied troops and Holocaust survivors would agree with the same story if all of this evidence is planted. 

Let me treat David Irving the same way you treat all the evidence I've cited. David Irving is just an attention seeker who makes up what he talks about, and took advantage of a neat conspiracy to dupe people like you. So are David Cole and Earnst Zundel. There, your sources are flawed now. 

Your entire previous post is just a smoke screen to dismiss and doubt a thousand reliable sources. This is how conspiracy theories like yours exist. 

I can have a reasonable discussion, but apparently you aren't able to get past your rhetorical questions and affinity to dismissing anything that contradicts you. 

I'll make my way through the "evidence" you've cited eventually, but the way that you've shown a lack of coherent thinking makes me feel like this discussion will never go anywhere. It will always just be you questioning anything I cite as made up by the grand coalition of Allies and Jews, plus the Holocaust survivors, plus the armies that went in. You've taken up enough time of my day, I've even taken some time out of my work hours to respond to your posts, but now I see that is futile.

You don't, you send them to gulags.

There are more 1st world white nations, that's why. The black ones aren't civilized, and it's not because they're black. If you don't believe me take a good honest look at ancient Rome and Greece, two barbaric nations made up of mostly whites.

1. They were not civilized because blacks are incapable on their own. After thousands of years they hadn't even invented a cup until the white man taught them. 2. Rome wasn't predominantly white towards the end, they were flooded with mixed races and collapsed. 3. Barbarism can be considered the innocent people Obama drone striked during his presidency.

The people that control Harvard & Yale descend from those that went to Frankfurt. It's literally the lessons taught at Frankfurt being implemented.

body:
> Like the Jewish Bolsheviks did?

Exactly.

> They were not civilized because blacks are incapable on their own. After thousands of years they hadn't even invented a cup until the white man taught them.

Not true. All the people I know are "those" people who are faultless, gods, perfect in every way, super talented and always leaders, achieving the impossible with minimal effort. At least one of them is Afrian-American. Meanwhile I know plenty of white people who are colossal failures.

> Barbarism can be considered the innocent people Obama drone striked during his presidency.

I don't know where you're getting the idea that I endorse Obama.

> Who's going to win a boxing match? The evil violent one or the virtue signalling peace creep that's worried about being called a name?

Except there be a miracle, the evil one usually. But that shouldn't be an excuse to be evil. Satan is the god of this world, so the way it works is that those who exploit others and do evil will rise to the top because of their thirst for power and dominion. That's unfortunate, but it doesn't make it acceptable to do so yourself. Humility may not give you the most advantages in the world but it's what's right. That doesn't mean weak, it doesn't mean you can't defend yourself and others. It means you can't be a hypocrite and use other people doing bad things as a way to justify your doing of the same thing. *Especially* when you complain relentlessly about their wrongdoings, since you do them yourself.

> Umm, the fact that jews admit it and brag about it?

So do any non-white SJWs.
