body:
1. They are just pawns of satan anyway, if it weren’t the Jews trying to destroy and/or subjugate races they deemed inferior, my bet is that the Chinese would quickly take up that mantle. People have to know better than to think simply getting rid of one drug dealer will mean no more drugs are sold in to people again, the only lasting change is to treat everyone in that town so they have interest in drugs whatsoever, regardless of how many dealers there are.

2. Part of the risk one runs in simply removing or eradicating the Jews (apart from how ineffective it would actually be at getting rid of the boss than runs them) is that it’s very easy to slip into the kind of crime and barbarism that Jews perpetuate on a daily basis. Once that happens, you are no better than the worst Jew.

3. As I said before, the Jews are just the pawns of satan, killing what’s basically a lumpenprole serving a beastly ringleader won’t solve your problems, he’ll just find a replacement from the endless pool of money hungry people that would give up anything for money and power. Your enemy is not the Jew, it is who the Jew serves. I’ll put it to you this way, even the worst Jew can be truly converted and serve God in the fight the devil, think of the Apostle Paul, for example.

Paul was Jew, a Pharisee that killed Christians. In his days as Saul, he lived the life of the kind of Anti-Christ Jew that have persecuted Christians since Jesus. God is so mighty and powerful that he took one such Jew and made him one his workers. Paul would go on to found the early Christian Chruch, and his life chronicles make up a large portion of the New Testament for good reason. Better to pray for the conversion of the Jew than the mere death of the Jew. For the Jews that reject God at every corner, we can also peace that our God is a God of righteous justice, you just need to remember to say focused on what really matters.

Love for God always trumps hate for his children (even those who have dedicated themselves to be His enemy)

body:
To be Godless in the struggle we face is death sentence my friend. Consider that carefully, there is a reason that the primary mission of the Jews has not just been to turn people into atheists, but more specifically, to turn Christians away from their faith first and foremost.

You call me naive, yet, you ignore how Jesus is attacked by the Jews in every single thing they do. From speaking of Him as “boiling in human excrement” in their Gnostic heretical book the Talmud, to the Communist Manifesto (Jewish treatise) singling out the Messiah specifically as fiction (Communism can actually tolerate belief in *A* supreme being, just not Jesus), the Jewish French Revolution was the same, as was the Jewish republicanism of the Spanish Civil war, to literally crucifying Jesus.

Materialism is a Jewish invention, they made it to deceive otherwise thinking people like you into believing that this is a purely human struggle. The Jew is cunning enough to believe in something, but they want you to believe in nothing. As a rule of thumb, it’s generally good to consider that whatever the Jew is desperately turning you away from is what you should be running toward. The Jews tolerate Islam more than Christianity, why do you think they are importing it like there is no tomorrow into Christian European nations? Why do you think Jews want to make it law to print “anti-semetic” warnings on the Christian Bible but not the Q’ran?

Consider these things, my brother, your life on earth and the life after depends on it. Will you let the fate be decided by your Jewish masters, or will you take up a mantle and serve a righteous king who warned us of Synagogue of Satan and promises us victory over them?

This victory will be won through our struggles and our sufferings, which our test of faith. This is a well and truly a spiritual war, and it is the Jew who wants you believe it is anything but that. Blessings to you, my brother. Please reflect on these things carefully.

body: Spy plane photos show no pyres and showed no constant incineration (smoke from chimneys less than 10% of the time).
body_html: Spy plane photos show no pyres and showed no constant incineration (smoke from chimneys less than 10% of the time).

parent.body:
That's only the ovens. Read on in the article, and open air burnings, mass graves, and burning pits were used too, which can more than make up the difference.

EDIT to include my calculation from my next post in case people are too lazy to click the continue link: 

46 ovens in Auschwitz, at a very low 26 people per day (later in the article, read that multiple-body burning at the same time could reduce the time down to 25 minutes per body, but let's stick with the conservative numbers for now): 46x26 = 1196 per day, x30 = 35,880 per month. Per year, x12 = 430,560. Lets say over 3 years, x3 =1,291,680. I think that's enough.

And that is not even including 1941, it's just the ovens, no outside body burning or mass graves, and assuming the estimate of 26 people per day per oven without multiple body burnings per oven, which could bring it down to 25 minutes per body.
parent.body_html:
That's only the ovens. Read on in the article, and open air burnings, mass graves, and burning pits were used too, which can more than make up the difference.

EDIT to include my calculation from my next post in case people are too lazy to click the continue link:

46 ovens in Auschwitz, at a very low 26 people per day (later in the article, read that multiple-body burning at the same time could reduce the time down to 25 minutes per body, but let's stick with the conservative numbers for now): 46x26 = 1196 per day, x30 = 35,880 per month. Per year, x12 = 430,560. Lets say over 3 years, x3 =1,291,680. I think that's enough.

And that is not even including 1941, it's just the ovens, no outside body burning or mass graves, and assuming the estimate of 26 people per day per oven without multiple body burnings per oven, which could bring it down to 25 minutes per body.

Ok I'm starting to see a pattern here, and why it's impossible to debate with a conspiracy theorist. Basically _anything_ I cite is a flawed source, meanwhile your beloved David Irving is the embodiment of truth with no ulterior motive. So, how does it feel when I dismiss everything you've cited?  Let's see: 

> "There's bias, where facts are ignored "

Um like you're ignoring the facts?

> "He also debunks the holocaust in 3 minutes"

I think he's just making that up for attention. 

> " Case in point I've also shown the Jews didn't need proof, but the Germans did."

I don't know, looks like a Nazi-sympathizing source. They are probably lying. 

> "Henry Ford wrote "The International Jew" before Hitler wrote Mein Kampf."

Yep there has always been a number of people who hate the Jews because they are jealous of their success. 

>"Your Zimmerman source is flawed because he's completely biased in his work and cites no credible sources." 

He cites 327 sources, it's unbelievable to see you just blanket statement against that. 

> "The sources you cite are all owned by Jews, that is not by accident."

Um no, To think that there is a homogeneous, well-defined group of Jewish individuals at the top of media who deliberately try to defend Israel is ridiculous. Sure there is rich, big city leftist group of individuals but they aren't defined by Judiasm. And the ones who are ethnically Jewish are so far removed from their original Judiasm they are just Europeans or Americans. And many of them hate Israel! They call Israel an apartheid state, and say it is guilty of war crimes, and needs to agree to the two-state solution which would end Israel as we know it. How you people think that the media is for Israel, when they are actually _actively working against Israel_, is beyond me. How did you not see the hate against Trump and Netanyahu when they were in the news together? Maybe it's your confirmation bias that denies anything you disagree with. 

*your so-called Jewish media threw a fit when Trump moved the embassy to Jerusalem!* 

> "Explain why these "death camps" had a birthing center, dental office, swimming pools, and a theater."

Why do I get a feeling that you just picked some random photos from Germany at the time and threw them into a screenshot? Hmm... that's my conspiracy theory. 

> "No authentic wartime document exists proving the crematoriums existed to that scale" 

I'm going to need you to cite an unbiased source saying that is true. Oh wait, you can't. 

> "Yet still not proven, the mass graves were never found."

You have to have more to doubt than just that, something more to go off of. 

>"Then there's the witness testimonies, why are they so far fetched?"

They seem pretty strongly corroboratory, and all say, I don't know, the Holocaust happened!

> "There's still holes to fill though, like why did free countries like the UK, France, USA, etc. align with COMMUNIST countries like Russia and China?"

That is such a simple question to answer, I can't believe you have to ask it. Maybe because _the Nazis attacked France and Britain, and were allied with Japan who attacked us?_ That question alone should prove you're an idiot. Your rhetorical questions are not arguments. 

* To continue believing in your position, you'd have to think that all the Allies (British, French, and Americans) were in on it and didn't snitch, and no soldiers did. They must have planted all this, and there is no evidence of them planing information. It's just a wild guess that you throw out there. This is what is wrong with conspiracy theories. There is no way that so many Allied troops and Holocaust survivors would agree with the same story if all of this evidence is planted. 

Let me treat David Irving the same way you treat all the evidence I've cited. David Irving is just an attention seeker who makes up what he talks about, and took advantage of a neat conspiracy to dupe people like you. So are David Cole and Earnst Zundel. There, your sources are flawed now. 

Your entire previous post is just a smoke screen to dismiss and doubt a thousand reliable sources. This is how conspiracy theories like yours exist. 

I can have a reasonable discussion, but apparently you aren't able to get past your rhetorical questions and affinity to dismissing anything that contradicts you. 

I'll make my way through the "evidence" you've cited eventually, but the way that you've shown a lack of coherent thinking makes me feel like this discussion will never go anywhere. It will always just be you questioning anything I cite as made up by the grand coalition of Allies and Jews, plus the Holocaust survivors, plus the armies that went in. You've taken up enough time of my day, I've even taken some time out of my work hours to respond to your posts, but now I see that is futile.
